channel.title: Can Someone Give ME the steps on how to have people download my server
channel.description:
hi i made a server and i have it on desktop but i want to know how i can put on like rapid share or something. and how do i take pics and post it?
please help or place steps please:)
ty for your times

item.title: Can Someone Give ME the steps on how to have people download my server
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Ill go through the instructions, I got nothing else to do?

Step 1 - Download WinRar if already haven’t

Step 2 - Right click your source folder and click Add To “Sources Name”.rar

Step 3 - Goto an easy uploading site like www.uppit.com and upload the .rar file there.

And your done

Read full topic
item.source: Can Someone Give ME the steps on how to have people download my server

item.title: Can Someone Give ME the steps on how to have people download my server
item.dc:creator: @sasquiotch sasquiotch
item.description:
@sasquiotch wrote:

use win.rar to compress it and upload it to megaupload… to get pics press print screen while on your server then paste it onto paint or something and save to ur desktop
